channel.title: Server advertising issue
channel.description: i'm not sure where to post this but i cant find any ware else to post. when i go to advertise my server on the status page it said it is approving but it never post it, ive been trying all day and i no my server works because i was just on with a few friends. Ive tried other stuff like this: [img]http://rs2status.freehostia.com/status.php?world=ServerName&host=Lowerscape.no-ip.info&port=43594[/img] it shows offline when i know its on because im logged on under my server ip. so i was wondering if there might be something wrong in like my server.java file or something that prevents finding the status of the server. Any ideas?

item.title: Server advertising issue
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Probably server status page?

Read full topic
